body.text:
We're rolling out foundational upgrades across the platform.

View in browser (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY5jMY8W69t95C6lZ3lwW35FW8W2m2HW2W2cRjgZ31FNl8N81c1F54rFrLW1jfFsT4HKM6TN36Y4bHklDh5W43j6w27YqjxDW8rJpSS8NZtJZW5ZNkM44g8QrFW8SG3sd6NKdmTN72qgmXzC17SW7t9LgW7VmC-7W835rx65X0hs0W8hQ_pC45SrslVWct9s22Pl-rW32NLRl2TNYHjVd8qxf6Lbs3kW2M9G4r13KkYVW566yRt82tXcVW4pMX-D58pWhtW5L3qZg8xLkGlW7RZ6q95nvj0YW606GFF67_sTzW5jNp_m7FN36hW2CKYpd2qyDQxW2_jtmr2LMwxLW2YXNMD7C_CYRW8jtcLt1KY6XMW1lBZz97V4zVjN2VVqYHdFFQNW45kyG-868QlkW4P81CP3Q_9lwW7s7pvW6cZkctW8xZBLn6zlD_vW4ll62c72_8n-W8WVdDv7w_MRCN8qtwR64yCN9f4KP3Dg04 )

Render Recap

February
2025

It's an exciting time here at Render—we're growing faster than ever, and so are the developers and teams who rely on our platform. In service of that growth, we're rolling out more enterprise-grade capabilities, shipping improvements for multiple service types, and expanding our team with amazing people who drive our mission forward.

Spotlight

Milestone

Our $80M Series C (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3nvW1pYrdZ2mJzV7W5ygT7h687ZKKW5q1fSt6w-mzYW8MWxSx6tnXcVW4YzrWx14t5t1W6sNyd-1x6cZFW2sr-tf3b5M1_W3MB-T31NY322W8xXWH32GZfHRW6kQKTw84qyVkW8R46vb2MMNknW9lh9f_2G9qRNW1Rc_XC2-nZhrW508wf03WmqXdW6Gf5zD5VXz66W5W8Nrs5WcRTkVL0VHj6Kdd8jW6NdRlX5mhkrpW5xK8cC94QFMlW7V5ypS3C6ctyf8v782R04 )

Having welcomed over two million developers to the platform, we're accelerating our vision for powerful and intuitive cloud infrastructure. Learn more on our blog (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3kWN338TbcsdqyxN72GTjjX_QvCW2XRC4Q8WGm2-M25-3_SBhbMW7F8rpH85rjm8W3C_1Rf2Pp29QW2Z2KJT4GSGnvN1VrnfZq3D0XN3Ycx3zP7LW6Vgwhgk5XGy3cW3y5XBc7BL64XW66MCl94Wy4x4W1-kXxd3PqK7DW73cp786hbZSVVy2kX01Fxt_BW1BHskZ3vmHgYW6Dqwnk2Bg7kwW50DhGL4cSSRHVhSvPh63w-qPW27kxj71J3kHrW7dl2zP2dJDMPW3Zx7cR6D-1xff2llVgC04 ) .

Early Access

SAML SSO for Enterprise (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQR2-dFMW7Y8-PT6lZ3mkN2VY2LPVgPRYW8kp7_r67TXKgW8w5Xgr5F1WGXW6MvkZN2NNSR8W5q7WhG8-f0r_N5S8JB_z12xZW2XVPq08cyWDFW7TB0yt32QbjrVt5F-c5NlJs8W6kt2W53dbH1DW8dQKLd5Sg9RFN2YTbXttsLknW7YWQ_W3lPfHCW5Z59BJ4TMkZYW1Vk-tv13fMs-VGTjd52JMdZnW1ndZxs5d3J2CW4dc22K3q7BJGW5dT2sq7Pb8fkW4dvVLt3QgYv_W7HwnG-6_KHClW2VyGqF8WvkwWV1tLMM94r0pGW8y39Q-7QSyHJW5KDCCY5H1sY6VbtkWf2ljklzf9gNSLv04 )

Organizations with an Enterprise plan can now request early access to SAML single sign-on. We'll help your team integrate Render with your identity provider to ensure a smooth rollout. Learn more in the documentation (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3l8W5vDtLc8w-G3jW8CZR147VSdXHW2BWKg27CyZ1rW8sxF9b6dc9WRN9kXkbHg6wcdN8rV5JjPs3sYW3n9_fq2n0FdWW4CBxty3FFdq8W52m7nB5-10MFW5rSkMy5BV35LMXWvCt354D4TCH3y99wMwdW8Xq1mX2P-zh8W9jSPtG8v1KpZW8_-4GF5x2ttpW5RJBb29b1QLtW5cTXLC5ydCwdW4fFYmM90_lC4V6FSjD89gJk9W1pJM-t4bCCvCf37Zfj-04 ) , and reach out (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3nZW90p6nd55fC8QW4dRkrm6w--b2MLqrQYJdj3ZW8sk_hR30DkfdVkG83-5hk1-kW2r58pT2lWTnsW5_b9MR2xxfdfW9fbgxx1M5HlmN5qPhZ78XJ4NW6WrdMn3v0SH2W3j-9DB30BCHlN63Rz3VFmkqvW4vG6H9206ZYBW5yn-155sw4MpW2xltgV9gsRscW8zL__G5MKDyJW2gPGGs5TJb8TW7fCzrf4cwN14W7j5yrD9gtyxgW4hSv7C3kr1c4f60-9FW04 ) for early access.

Platform Improvements

Storage

Introducing Render Key Value, powered by Valkey (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQx2-dFMW7lCdLW6lZ3nwW4hXRHR5nHtVxW1YLYty1Hf945N8s_4232m8NtW9k8YNm92TdCvW8xDX-58dPpWdW5GtKv390GD-6W92Mn198VPVFvW6jV5jg1sr7fGW17fbB320yFWyW6sz4jl7MKj9_V7t8KW7DkzSGW3Pw_pN16JV-3W7VLvCr5gppk8W72tc731X_rSLW79vkBD2gpMklW2n9Jc-105wmhW6dHJJF7xlsb-W4kC9pk1gXQqmW4qz5Ps5JRPpqW8xPj3N8B3J89W8l9_Yp1ZYz5-W29bqBK3RRnYkW30f5y114wV4QW8MZw_b4lJLTRf6qJJzC04 )

Render has upgraded to Valkey 8 from Redis® 6 for newly created Key Value instances on the platform. Valkey is an open-source, Redis-compatible datastore with some powerful improvements (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3p4W4BHpNF3LgHRDW1f39Dh3Q4t_1Vp_pRw7sDRwCW2rRcKG3pDtv5W7N0JJm5-0tBcW3NxjX95Fs5trN2jktHRPKK0QW5R12Ys3qMPbcN3FkB2Mk_8RVW6c_FMr4ttykQN48ml9g4ZcLcVdRxxg5mF16FW4KpzvR2KWft0W38d6Cb9gj78WW2q66Lh2Gs4hmW5303Pk1PSlJJW32KqQJ7VqTcjW28WMG43sly99W94ZXW_3b7XfGW3mKcp81TFXdyDzP7CJjsyLW1gzpQZ5vjf88f2r5b6R04 ) . All existing Redis instances continue operating as usual. Learn more about this change in the documentation (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lxW94kJk_8SMqCFW8Bn6Vs1xBktPW2MddGH146wFDW8ZQ32Q5rHQZNW8gYmdk7CDFPLW1JxbJC6KT-0JW6RH3J48S6KVvW74NF9z8SfFmPW5bWWxF720YHgW8WYSWJ2WkBdlVlFdYj4tsP_MW3BBXHJ21YNQfW63XLb66x7_g2W4yBVcC3TlMhhW4nrW0B16QNndW7SQ6FV7xf1h0W1GWnpl4yM0nRW2QGmJ41dVYKZW2BvlcL8Wj7n8W5-kLhC32DDqqW45MdV-5tzdVMW4QHqrS5cDQvWf1C9qsC04 ) .

Data Privacy

Render is now certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FR62-dFMW8wLKSR6lZ3mXW6H-gRM1ndTKtVgNbJj7ltDXcW8x2Zyd8vPr1XW6sG01S1t0s_wW8nTG_31k6rGhVH66Ng5Ql6RsW8gsj011YmZ_MVCvV4b5YLMbWW1PmVKf1BwR2RW4NltXH53LKwwW7GFs9m4_l6x1W5vD4KC91-pm8W6ppvgT8JMR9wW2vWqWf1QcK5MVd5Tzs26SjN-W6dZ1vL3K5GHyW6dgVWR1rf9mJW3dpjm42xlRsJW60dZch2w8ltTW4cwR_g6LKPCkVBVlqx8vGW05W8HWdnj5xLtkFW56B0fM59p9zhW74M_D36C1q05W7P3_9G1xDs6_W1Kx2JY6WB8d9W4LwFSW19RQkTW93fwvC6v1fF6f8f44hq04 )

This certification demonstrates our ongoing commitment to protecting your personal data and enabling compliance with the latest privacy regulations. View the details of this certification under Render's entry at dataprivacyframework.gov/list (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lHW6l2fk754m5g4MgYX0dqN4x-W1PPQD697ct7mW8WQvdN3lFNkjW79mDBk4fklz-W575Kgv7BQnRtW6ZGVvf5RhFC2W8srr6b6ZR8K0N201W39kS4vtW1H-FsC1_MJqFW42wmrb5NksDLW8bhSc47-8DtFV7_yRK2Ybmc0W64QNd88ZVVf0W2T8lfG4T7Lg0Mv79W0ggVHzW1K1gry1BQ7zSW3vmmvv24HZcVW4XX-fL8J2VrvVKJLB41Vh-0rW6jgPpH3mTmRbW1jJd-67WryMNf17P5t604 ) .

Performance

Cron jobs now spin up faster (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQR2-dFMW7Y8-PT6lZ3kJW65rmM77z7hpnW1-XQWV6w4BRHW22PBV83KQxbSW2XNzGx2fRTlHN4zPvf2J2xTJW6-WBFy4GxdMHW2VPnSr2h4bqKW1ypP092zlvNVV37SSt4JfMmlW2nj60R63gldbW1SwWtz3yHfNVW3wPsqw8bPWNBW3ygLWQ3T2sTkW4Z7yRb12XlTmW1PBKm56f83YNN77CtrVY7GzDW1wWfZ_8f6mvlTx1NB7WJcC9W1v-4237fw_f3W77vJMg1GwQRpVKsLtB26f3dHW5JNvHl7ZwsL9W9m4XTZ6_nfMnW5qPfRM2ryyswW6ZTzNk2C_49kW1s2Gmd7ykYDtf5yhFYn04 )

Thanks to recent build caching improvements, cron job runs now spin up in a fraction of the time—often 80% faster than before.

To take advantage of this speedup, make sure your cron job has been built at least once since February 1st! You can manually trigger a build in your dashboard.

More Updates

How-To

Build an AI Agent with Inngest and Render (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd2-dFMW6N1vHY6lZ3pcN445-fnvs6T3W523RV65pRpXKN6TKxPbzlQs_W5sYfWZ1DZhZ6W7y5Kpq5KgJljW6M60yC475Nf5W9hcPjh4-ySgRW1cDfwD8_XSTDW5VdM7T3NVSZnW6RQwdg7ppGbSW1b_GmH7GvqrCW2p553G6Yv1nDW1gn-KP4sBFGxW6TYmbQ845zdvW4Scs9F2ykCXnVJ12D05cG2D2W1FQqnH80cP80V6s47G8BTXykW4XSxRZ8rq14WW7_Bp752KVzpnVVhW7J96WtcKW2vFwpF5D-wDKf147H7T04 )

Created with our friends at Inngest, this hands-on tutorial covers deploying three components: a Render Postgres database with the pgvector extension, a cron job, and a full-stack Next.js web app. The app uses Inngest and its AgentKit library to define the AI agents and orchestrate the AI workflow.

Check out the webinar recording (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lgW7Ckx5k3l1t4FW13gYX04cz-jTW2hmjcQ1C3kn_W4Y2s0C2B8W4pF5ym_zyPtJbW5sfqcC7bcLt2W8jftNX5b79D-W3C5KP37rWSsYW60JsmP3XsWFRVDLkr38qxfYyW4js3wh2RwKSqW8cxFQk1Zk2VfW4lN-9Q8cVmGmVXsDB11Hfn3jW9dFjTp4ZSQQ2N4YtLf4YpykhW29tPRP9fwRS4W57c81f6Hmls7W7qwnQJ84Dw1bW37XQLh4jR7j8W5mBL5b3pMXXkN6C9qVZxDrPgf5v0bpP04 ) for a full walkthrough of the project. You'll also get tips on bringing agents to production.

Work at Render

Senior Software Engineer, Product (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3m7W7cS3Ks3tBQWKW2Ct1hh31g6cBN5X2mRcFhf3zVnW6hZ31Kkm2W3StKtY3KL0v8Vw6m1T6JHqMxW2G64XG3Pt432W2d-Syx5mfz__W3JYPM08G0BPsW5TCmhT7W5qz3W8vTbh573HFfPW2RJFSb6J8C4MW89Cw8-6z9_xhW87-12t5hV4WRW7qNXsB4mJ_8FW2qw-D27yKdvTW7Y-JD15zqCcYW6FwPGq8S3Gy2W6p5GgQ5gfN20W12RkjW62dFHFf7cXgvH04 )

Take end-to-end ownership of full-stack projects to deliver new features that make the Render platform more powerful for every developer.

We're hiring across multiple teams! Check out our careers page (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3m7W7cS3Ks3tBQWKW2Ct1hh31g6cBN5X2mRcFhf3zVnW6hZ31Kkm2W3StKtY3KL0v8Vw6m1T6JHqMxW2G64XG3Pt432W2d-Syx5mfz__W3JYPM08G0BPsW5TCmhT7W5qz3W8vTbh573HFfPW2RJFSb6J8C4MW89Cw8-6z9_xhW87-12t5hV4WRW7qNXsB4mJ_8FW2qw-D27yKdvTW7Y-JD15zqCcYW6FwPGq8S3Gy2W6p5GgQ5gfN20W12RkjW62dFHFf7cXgvH04 ) .

body.html:
We're rolling out foundational upgrades across the platform.
View in browser

Render Recap

 February 2025

It's an exciting time here at Render—we're growing faster than ever, and so are the developers and teams who rely on our platform. In service of that growth, we're rolling out more enterprise-grade capabilities, shipping improvements for multiple service types, and expanding our team with amazing people who drive our mission forward.

Spotlight
Milestone

Our $80M Series C

Having welcomed over two million developers to the platform, we're accelerating our vision for powerful and intuitive cloud infrastructure. Learn more on our blog.
Early Access

SAML SSO for Enterprise

Organizations with an Enterprise plan can now request early access to SAML single sign-on. We'll help your team integrate Render with your identity provider to ensure a smooth rollout. Learn more in the documentation, and reach out for early access.

Platform Improvements
Storage

Introducing Render Key Value, powered by Valkey

Render has upgraded to Valkey 8 from Redis® 6 for newly created Key Value instances on the platform. Valkey is an open-source, Redis-compatible datastore with some powerful improvements. All existing Redis instances continue operating as usual. Learn more about this change in the documentation.

Data Privacy

Render is now certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework

This certification demonstrates our ongoing commitment to protecting your personal data and enabling compliance with the latest privacy regulations. View the details of this certification under Render's entry at dataprivacyframework.gov/list.

Performance

Cron jobs now spin up faster

Thanks to recent build caching improvements, cron job runs now spin up in a fraction of the time—often 80% faster than before.

To take advantage of this speedup, make sure your cron job has been built at least once since February 1st! You can manually trigger a build in your dashboard.

More Updates
How-To

Build an AI Agent with Inngest and Render

Created with our friends at Inngest, this hands-on tutorial covers deploying three components: a Render Postgres database with the pgvector extension, a cron job, and a full-stack Next.js web app. The app uses Inngest and its AgentKit library to define the AI agents and orchestrate the AI workflow.

Check out the webinar recording for a full walkthrough of the project. You'll also get tips on bringing agents to production.

Work at Render

Senior Software Engineer, Product

Take end-to-end ownership of full-stack projects to deliver new features that make the Render platform more powerful for every developer.

We're hiring across multiple teams! Check out our careers page.

Render, Inc., 525 Brannan St., San Francisco, California

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

Render Recap

February
2025

It's an exciting time here at Render—we're growing faster than ever, and so are the developers and teams who rely on our platform. In service of that growth, we're rolling out more enterprise-grade capabilities, shipping improvements for multiple service types, and expanding our team with amazing people who drive our mission forward.

Spotlight

Milestone

Our $80M Series C (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3nvW1pYrdZ2mJzV7W5ygT7h687ZKKW5q1fSt6w-mzYW8MWxSx6tnXcVW4YzrWx14t5t1W6sNyd-1x6cZFW2sr-tf3b5M1_W3MB-T31NY322W8xXWH32GZfHRW6kQKTw84qyVkW8R46vb2MMNknW9lh9f_2G9qRNW1Rc_XC2-nZhrW508wf03WmqXdW6Gf5zD5VXz66W5W8Nrs5WcRTkVL0VHj6Kdd8jW6NdRlX5mhkrpW5xK8cC94QFMlW7V5ypS3C6ctyf8v782R04 )

SAML SSO for Enterprise (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQR2-dFMW7Y8-PT6lZ3mkN2VY2LPVgPRYW8kp7_r67TXKgW8w5Xgr5F1WGXW6MvkZN2NNSR8W5q7WhG8-f0r_N5S8JB_z12xZW2XVPq08cyWDFW7TB0yt32QbjrVt5F-c5NlJs8W6kt2W53dbH1DW8dQKLd5Sg9RFN2YTbXttsLknW7YWQ_W3lPfHCW5Z59BJ4TMkZYW1Vk-tv13fMs-VGTjd52JMdZnW1ndZxs5d3J2CW4dc22K3q7BJGW5dT2sq7Pb8fkW4dvVLt3QgYv_W7HwnG-6_KHClW2VyGqF8WvkwWV1tLMM94r0pGW8y39Q-7QSyHJW5KDCCY5H1sY6VbtkWf2ljklzf9gNSLv04 )

Organizations with an Enterprise plan can now request early access to SAML single sign-on. We'll help your team integrate Render with your identity provider to ensure a smooth rollout. Learn more in the documentation (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3l8W5vDtLc8w-G3jW8CZR147VSdXHW2BWKg27CyZ1rW8sxF9b6dc9WRN9kXkbHg6wcdN8rV5JjPs3sYW3n9_fq2n0FdWW4CBxty3FFdq8W52m7nB5-10MFW5rSkMy5BV35LMXWvCt354D4TCH3y99wMwdW8Xq1mX2P-zh8W9jSPtG8v1KpZW8_-4GF5x2ttpW5RJBb29b1QLtW5cTXLC5ydCwdW4fFYmM90_lC4V6FSjD89gJk9W1pJM-t4bCCvCf37Zfj-04 ) , and reach out (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FPY3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3nZW90p6nd55fC8QW4dRkrm6w--b2MLqrQYJdj3ZW8sk_hR30DkfdVkG83-5hk1-kW2r58pT2lWTnsW5_b9MR2xxfdfW9fbgxx1M5HlmN5qPhZ78XJ4NW6WrdMn3v0SH2W3j-9DB30BCHlN63Rz3VFmkqvW4vG6H9206ZYBW5yn-155sw4MpW2xltgV9gsRscW8zL__G5MKDyJW2gPGGs5TJb8TW7fCzrf4cwN14W7j5yrD9gtyxgW4hSv7C3kr1c4f60-9FW04 ) for early access.

Platform Improvements

Storage

Introducing Render Key Value, powered by Valkey (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQx2-dFMW7lCdLW6lZ3nwW4hXRHR5nHtVxW1YLYty1Hf945N8s_4232m8NtW9k8YNm92TdCvW8xDX-58dPpWdW5GtKv390GD-6W92Mn198VPVFvW6jV5jg1sr7fGW17fbB320yFWyW6sz4jl7MKj9_V7t8KW7DkzSGW3Pw_pN16JV-3W7VLvCr5gppk8W72tc731X_rSLW79vkBD2gpMklW2n9Jc-105wmhW6dHJJF7xlsb-W4kC9pk1gXQqmW4qz5Ps5JRPpqW8xPj3N8B3J89W8l9_Yp1ZYz5-W29bqBK3RRnYkW30f5y114wV4QW8MZw_b4lJLTRf6qJJzC04 )

Valkey is an open-source, Redis-compatible datastore with some powerful improvements (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3p4W4BHpNF3LgHRDW1f39Dh3Q4t_1Vp_pRw7sDRwCW2rRcKG3pDtv5W7N0JJm5-0tBcW3NxjX95Fs5trN2jktHRPKK0QW5R12Ys3qMPbcN3FkB2Mk_8RVW6c_FMr4ttykQN48ml9g4ZcLcVdRxxg5mF16FW4KpzvR2KWft0W38d6Cb9gj78WW2q66Lh2Gs4hmW5303Pk1PSlJJW32KqQJ7VqTcjW28WMG43sly99W94ZXW_3b7XfGW3mKcp81TFXdyDzP7CJjsyLW1gzpQZ5vjf88f2r5b6R04 ) . All existing Redis instances continue operating as usual. Learn more about this change in the documentation (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lxW94kJk_8SMqCFW8Bn6Vs1xBktPW2MddGH146wFDW8ZQ32Q5rHQZNW8gYmdk7CDFPLW1JxbJC6KT-0JW6RH3J48S6KVvW74NF9z8SfFmPW5bWWxF720YHgW8WYSWJ2WkBdlVlFdYj4tsP_MW3BBXHJ21YNQfW63XLb66x7_g2W4yBVcC3TlMhhW4nrW0B16QNndW7SQ6FV7xf1h0W1GWnpl4yM0nRW2QGmJ41dVYKZW2BvlcL8Wj7n8W5-kLhC32DDqqW45MdV-5tzdVMW4QHqrS5cDQvWf1C9qsC04 ) .

Render is now certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FR62-dFMW8wLKSR6lZ3mXW6H-gRM1ndTKtVgNbJj7ltDXcW8x2Zyd8vPr1XW6sG01S1t0s_wW8nTG_31k6rGhVH66Ng5Ql6RsW8gsj011YmZ_MVCvV4b5YLMbWW1PmVKf1BwR2RW4NltXH53LKwwW7GFs9m4_l6x1W5vD4KC91-pm8W6ppvgT8JMR9wW2vWqWf1QcK5MVd5Tzs26SjN-W6dZ1vL3K5GHyW6dgVWR1rf9mJW3dpjm42xlRsJW60dZch2w8ltTW4cwR_g6LKPCkVBVlqx8vGW05W8HWdnj5xLtkFW56B0fM59p9zhW74M_D36C1q05W7P3_9G1xDs6_W1Kx2JY6WB8d9W4LwFSW19RQkTW93fwvC6v1fF6f8f44hq04 )

This certification demonstrates our ongoing commitment to protecting your personal data and enabling compliance with the latest privacy regulations. View the details of this certification under Render's entry at dataprivacyframework.gov/list (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lHW6l2fk754m5g4MgYX0dqN4x-W1PPQD697ct7mW8WQvdN3lFNkjW79mDBk4fklz-W575Kgv7BQnRtW6ZGVvf5RhFC2W8srr6b6ZR8K0N201W39kS4vtW1H-FsC1_MJqFW42wmrb5NksDLW8bhSc47-8DtFV7_yRK2Ybmc0W64QNd88ZVVf0W2T8lfG4T7Lg0Mv79W0ggVHzW1K1gry1BQ7zSW3vmmvv24HZcVW4XX-fL8J2VrvVKJLB41Vh-0rW6jgPpH3mTmRbW1jJd-67WryMNf17P5t604 ) .

Performance

Cron jobs now spin up faster (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQR2-dFMW7Y8-PT6lZ3kJW65rmM77z7hpnW1-XQWV6w4BRHW22PBV83KQxbSW2XNzGx2fRTlHN4zPvf2J2xTJW6-WBFy4GxdMHW2VPnSr2h4bqKW1ypP092zlvNVV37SSt4JfMmlW2nj60R63gldbW1SwWtz3yHfNVW3wPsqw8bPWNBW3ygLWQ3T2sTkW4Z7yRb12XlTmW1PBKm56f83YNN77CtrVY7GzDW1wWfZ_8f6mvlTx1NB7WJcC9W1v-4237fw_f3W77vJMg1GwQRpVKsLtB26f3dHW5JNvHl7ZwsL9W9m4XTZ6_nfMnW5qPfRM2ryyswW6ZTzNk2C_49kW1s2Gmd7ykYDtf5yhFYn04 )

Thanks to recent build caching improvements, cron job runs now spin up in a fraction of the time—often 80% faster than before.

To take advantage of this speedup, make sure your cron job has been built at least once since February 1st! You can manually trigger a build in your dashboard.

More Updates

How-To

Build an AI Agent with Inngest and Render (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd2-dFMW6N1vHY6lZ3pcN445-fnvs6T3W523RV65pRpXKN6TKxPbzlQs_W5sYfWZ1DZhZ6W7y5Kpq5KgJljW6M60yC475Nf5W9hcPjh4-ySgRW1cDfwD8_XSTDW5VdM7T3NVSZnW6RQwdg7ppGbSW1b_GmH7GvqrCW2p553G6Yv1nDW1gn-KP4sBFGxW6TYmbQ845zdvW4Scs9F2ykCXnVJ12D05cG2D2W1FQqnH80cP80V6s47G8BTXykW4XSxRZ8rq14WW7_Bp752KVzpnVVhW7J96WtcKW2vFwpF5D-wDKf147H7T04 )

Created with our friends at Inngest, this hands-on tutorial covers deploying three components: a Render Postgres database with the pgvector extension, a cron job, and a full-stack Next.js web app. The app uses Inngest and its AgentKit library to define the AI agents and orchestrate the AI workflow.

Check out the webinar recording (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVvF1B2q9yD1W68CFJJ5wlc8pVmLt1V5ss-jkN5j5FQd3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3lgW7Ckx5k3l1t4FW13gYX04cz-jTW2hmjcQ1C3kn_W4Y2s0C2B8W4pF5ym_zyPtJbW5sfqcC7bcLt2W8jftNX5b79D-W3C5KP37rWSsYW60JsmP3XsWFRVDLkr38qxfYyW4js3wh2RwKSqW8cxFQk1Zk2VfW4lN-9Q8cVmGmVXsDB11Hfn3jW9dFjTp4ZSQQ2N4YtLf4YpykhW29tPRP9fwRS4W57c81f6Hmls7W7qwnQJ84Dw1bW37XQLh4jR7j8W5mBL5b3pMXXkN6C9qVZxDrPgf5v0bpP04 ) for a full walkthrough of the project. You'll also get tips on bringing agents to production.

email_body.html:
We're rolling out foundational upgrades across the platform.
View in browser

Render Recap

 February 2025

It's an exciting time here at Render—we're growing faster than ever, and so are the developers and teams who rely on our platform. In service of that growth, we're rolling out more enterprise-grade capabilities, shipping improvements for multiple service types, and expanding our team with amazing people who drive our mission forward.

Spotlight
Milestone

Our $80M Series C

Having welcomed over two million developers to the platform, we're accelerating our vision for powerful and intuitive cloud infrastructure. Learn more on our blog.
Early Access

SAML SSO for Enterprise

Organizations with an Enterprise plan can now request early access to SAML single sign-on. We'll help your team integrate Render with your identity provider to ensure a smooth rollout. Learn more in the documentation, and reach out for early access.

Platform Improvements
Storage

Introducing Render Key Value, powered by Valkey

Render has upgraded to Valkey 8 from Redis® 6 for newly created Key Value instances on the platform. Valkey is an open-source, Redis-compatible datastore with some powerful improvements. All existing Redis instances continue operating as usual. Learn more about this change in the documentation.

Data Privacy

Render is now certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework

This certification demonstrates our ongoing commitment to protecting your personal data and enabling compliance with the latest privacy regulations. View the details of this certification under Render's entry at dataprivacyframework.gov/list.

Performance

Cron jobs now spin up faster

Thanks to recent build caching improvements, cron job runs now spin up in a fraction of the time—often 80% faster than before.

To take advantage of this speedup, make sure your cron job has been built at least once since February 1st! You can manually trigger a build in your dashboard.

More Updates
How-To

Build an AI Agent with Inngest and Render

Created with our friends at Inngest, this hands-on tutorial covers deploying three components: a Render Postgres database with the pgvector extension, a cron job, and a full-stack Next.js web app. The app uses Inngest and its AgentKit library to define the AI agents and orchestrate the AI workflow.

Check out the webinar recording for a full walkthrough of the project. You'll also get tips on bringing agents to production.

Work at Render

Senior Software Engineer, Product

Take end-to-end ownership of full-stack projects to deliver new features that make the Render platform more powerful for every developer.

We're hiring across multiple teams! Check out our careers page.

Render, Inc., 525 Brannan St., San Francisco, California

Unsubscribe Manage preferences
